title: Is it just impossible to find healthy bread these days?
body:
I'm not a health nut or anything, but I do try to eat as healthy as possible. One area that consistently gives me trouble though is bread. I love the convenience and portability of sandwiches; they're my go-to lunch for a busy day. Not to mention peanut butter is probably one of my favorite foods ever.

But it seems to be impossible to find bread that's not loaded with preservatives and unnecessary sugar, lactic acid, glucose/fructose, triglycerides, and a whole bunch of other unpronounceable ingredients that make it seem like you're eating a loaf of candy. 

I really don't want to have to give up sandwiches, but I really struggle to justify eating this crap. How do you guys do it?
